column5: OPS Manor is close to stores,shopping malls, restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, nightlife, and public transport. OPS Manor is located 15 minutes from downtown Dallas where The Texas State fair and Mega bus station is located. Dallas Zoo is 13 miles in route to downtown. Also 35 minutes from the DFW airport. ATT Center is 20 minutes from OPS Manor and OPS Manor is 2 mile from IH 35
